text: Martin "Marty" Bregman (May 18, 1926 â€“ June 16, 2018) was an American movie producer. He was born in New York City. Bregman produced many movies including Scarface, Sea of Love, Venom, Serpico, Dog Day Afternoon, The Four Seasons, Betsy's Wedding, Carlito's Way, Carlito's Way: Rise to Power, The Bone Collector and The Adventures of Pluto Nash. Bregman died of a cerebral hemorrhage in New York City on June 16, 2018 at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Martin Bregman
